briefTitle: Headache in the Emergency Department (ED) - A Multi-Center Research Network to Optimize the ED Treatment of Migraines

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Migraine with or without aura; probable migraine without aura

Exclusion Criteria:

* Secondary headache
* Allergy, contraindication or intolerance to study medication

outcomeMeasures.title: Persistent Headache Pain Free at 24 Hours
outcomeMeasures.description: Achieve headache freedom within two hours in the emergency department and no recurrence of pain within 24 hours of emergency department discharge

outcomeMeasures.title: Functional Disability at 24 Hours
outcomeMeasures.description: No functional impairment within 24 hours of emergency department discharge
